title: Replace 'Tropical' zone value with '40' in BirdDataTable

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/BirdDataTable.tsx only, update the 'Zone' (المنطقة) column so that any cell displaying the value 'Tropical' renders '40' instead. This change must apply to both the read-only display cells and the editable input fields in inline-edit mode. Do NOT change any other column definitions, layout, RTL orientation, horizontal scrolling behavior, color scheme, admin access control logic, data-fetching logic, font sizes, action buttons, or any other aspect of the component. Do NOT modify any other file, component, page, route, or backend file.

quotes: استبد في جدول البيانات المنطقة استوائية الى 40 بدون ان تغير اي شيء اخر في الجدول

acceptanceCriteria: Any cell in the 'Zone' (المنطقة) column that previously displayed 'Tropical' now displays '40'.
The substitution applies to read-only display cells in normal table view.
The substitution applies to the editable input fields when a row is in inline-edit mode.
No other column, row, styling, layout, or functionality of BirdDataTable.tsx is changed.
No other file, component, page, route, or backend file is modified.

constraints: No other file, component, page, route, or backend file may be changed.

All existing column definitions, layout, RTL orientation, horizontal scrolling, color scheme, admin access control logic, data-fetching logic, font sizes, and action buttons must remain exactly as they are.
nonGoals: Changing the backend data model or stored zone values.
Modifying any other column or field in the table.
Altering any other component, page, or route.
